mapper.sql: select id, user_id, collection_id, collection_name, collection_number, collection_hash, link_addr, is_link, source_info, is_exist, real_company, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time from cnt_user_collection
mapper.select: select cuc.id, cuc.collection_id collectionid, cu.nick_name nickname, cu.phone phone, cuc.collection_name collectionname, cuc.collection_number collectionnumber, cuc.collection_hash collectionhash, cuc.link_addr linkaddr, cuc.is_link islink, cuc.source_info sourceinfo, cuc.real_company realcompany, cuc.created_time createdtime, cuc.updated_time updatedtime from cnt_user_collection cuc inner join cnt_user cu on cuc.user_id=cu.user_id where cuc.user_id=#{userid} order by cuc.created_time desc
